The European Network of Ethnobiologists is a network people working, interested or related to ethnobiology based in Europe. With this web we aim to expand our network, share and publish new publications and be able to reach new ethnobiologists!

## Interests

Ethnoecoogy
Ethnomicology
Ethnobotany
Ethnozoology
Decolonization
Ecological Knowledge
Traditional Knowledge
